00036 #define IS_CONSTANT(c) \
00037     (unsigned(c) - dbvmLoadVarBool <= (unsigned)dbvmLoadRectangleConstant - dbvmLoadVarBool)

00138 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbExprNodeAllocator { 
00139   private:
00140     friend class dbExprNodeSegment;
00141     dbExprNode*        freeNodeList;
00142     dbExprNodeSegment* segmentList;
00143     dbMutex            mutex;
00144     
00145   public:  
00146     dbMutex&    getMutex() {
00147         return mutex;
00148     }
00149     dbExprNode* allocate();
00150     void        deallocate(dbExprNode* node);
00151     void        reset();
00152 
00153     ~dbExprNodeAllocator();
00154     static dbExprNodeAllocator instance;
00155 };

00157 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbExprNode { 
00158     friend class dbExprNodeSegment;
00159   public:
00160     nat1 cop;
00161     nat1 type;
00162     nat2 offs;
00163 
00164     static const nat1  nodeTypes[];
00165     static const nat1  nodeOperands[];
00166     static const nat1  commutativeOperator[];
00167 
00168     struct ref_operands { 
00169         dbExprNode*         base;  // the same as operand[0]
00170         dbFieldDescriptor*  field;
00171     };
00172 
00173     struct func_operands { 
00174         dbExprNode*         arg[3]; 
00175         void*               fptr;
00176     };
00177 
00178 #ifdef USE_REGEX
00179     struct regex_operands { 
00180         dbExprNode*         opd;  
00181         regex_t             re;
00182     };
00183 #endif
00184 
00185     union { 
00186         dbExprNode*    operand[3];
00187         dbExprNode*    next;
00188         oid_t          oid;
00189         db_int8        ivalue;
00190         real8          fvalue;
00191         rectangle      rvalue;
00192         dbStrLiteral   svalue;
00193         dbWStrLiteral  wsvalue;
00194         void const*    var;
00195         ref_operands   ref;
00196         func_operands  func;
00197 #ifdef USE_REGEX
00198         regex_operands regex;
00199 #endif
00200     };
00201 
00202     dbExprNode(dbExprNode* node);
00203 
00204     dbExprNode(int cop, dbExprNode* left = NULL, dbExprNode* right = NULL, 
00205                dbExprNode* right2 = NULL)
00206     {
00207         this->cop = cop;
00208         type = nodeTypes[cop];
00209         operand[0] = left;
00210         operand[1] = right;
00211         operand[2] = right2;
00212     }
00213     dbExprNode(int cop, dbExprNode* expr1, dbExprNode* expr2, int offs) { 
00214         this->cop = cop;
00215         this->offs = (nat2)offs;
00216         type = nodeTypes[cop];
00217         operand[0] = expr1;
00218         operand[1] = expr2;
00219     }
00220     dbExprNode(int cop, dbExprNode* expr, int offs) { 
00221         this->cop = cop;
00222         this->offs = (nat2)offs;
00223         type = nodeTypes[cop];
00224         operand[0] = expr;
00225     }
00226     dbExprNode(int cop, dbFieldDescriptor* field, dbExprNode* base = NULL) 
00227     {
00228         this->cop = cop;
00229         this->offs = (nat2)field->dbsOffs;
00230         type = nodeTypes[cop];
00231         ref.field = field;
00232         ref.base = base;
00233     }
00234     dbExprNode(int cop, db_int8 ivalue) { 
00235         this->cop = cop;
00236         this->ivalue = ivalue;
00237         type = tpInteger;
00238     }
00239     dbExprNode(int cop, real8 fvalue) { 
00240         this->cop = cop;
00241         this->fvalue = fvalue;
00242         type = tpReal;
00243     }
00244     dbExprNode(int cop, rectangle rvalue) {
00245         this->cop = cop;
00246         this->rvalue = rvalue;
00247         type = tpRectangle;
00248     }
00249     dbExprNode(int cop, dbStrLiteral& svalue) { 
00250         this->cop = cop;
00251         this->svalue = svalue;
00252         type = tpString;
00253     }
00254     dbExprNode(int cop, dbWStrLiteral& wsvalue) { 
00255         this->cop = cop;
00256         this->wsvalue = wsvalue;
00257         type = tpWString;
00258     }
00259     dbExprNode(int cop, void const* var) { 
00260         this->cop = cop;
00261         this->var = var;
00262         type = nodeTypes[cop];
00263     }
00264     dbExprNode(int cop, void* fptr, dbExprNode* expr1, dbExprNode* expr2 = NULL, dbExprNode* expr3 = NULL) { 
00265         this->cop = cop;
00266         func.arg[0] = expr1;
00267         func.arg[1] = expr2;
00268         func.arg[2] = expr3;
00269         func.fptr = fptr;
00270         type = nodeTypes[cop];
00271     }
00272     ~dbExprNode();
00273 
00274     void* operator new(size_t size EXTRA_DEBUG_NEW_PARAMS) { 
00275         return dbExprNodeAllocator::instance.allocate();
00276     }
00277 
00278     void operator delete(void* ptr EXTRA_DEBUG_NEW_PARAMS) { 
00279         dbExprNodeAllocator::instance.deallocate((dbExprNode*)ptr);
00280     }
00281 };

00300 class dbOrderByNode { 
00301   public:
00302     dbOrderByNode*     next;
00303     dbFieldDescriptor* field;
00304     dbTableDescriptor* table;
00305     dbExprNode*        expr;
00306     bool               ascent;  // true for ascent order, false for descent 
00307     
00308     dbFieldDescriptor* getField() {
00309         return (field != NULL) ? field
00310             : ((unsigned)expr->cop - dbvmLoadBool <= dbvmLoadRawBinary - dbvmLoadBool) 
00311                ? expr->ref.field : NULL;
00312     }
00313 
00314     ~dbOrderByNode() { 
00315         delete expr;
00316     }
00317 };
00318 
00319 class dbFollowByNode { 
00320   public:
00321     dbFollowByNode*    next;
00322     dbFieldDescriptor* field;
00323 };

00399 
00400     dbProcessId currPid;

00407     
00408     dbDatabaseThreadContext() { 
00409         concurrentId = 0;
00410         readAccess = false;
00411         writeAccess = false;
00412         mutatorCSLocked = false;
00413         isMutator = false;
00414         interactive = false;
00415         catched = false;
00416         commitDelayed = false;
00417         removeContext = false;
00418         currPid = dbProcessId::getCurrent();
00419     }

00440 struct FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbInheritedAttribute { 
00441     byte*          record;
00442     oid_t          oid;
00443     dbTable*       table;
00444     dbDatabase*    db;
00445     dbStringValue* tempStrings;
00446     size_t         paramBase;
00447     enum { 
00448         internalStrBufSize = 8*1024 
00449     };
00450     size_t         strBufPos;
00451     char           strBuf[internalStrBufSize];
00452     
00453     struct { 
00454         int     index;
00455         jmp_buf unwind;
00456     } exists_iterator[dbCompiler::maxFreeVars];
00457 
00458     void removeTemporaries();
00459 
00460     dbInheritedAttribute() { 
00461         tempStrings = NULL;
00462         strBufPos = 0;
00463     }
00464 
00465     ~dbInheritedAttribute() { 
00466         removeTemporaries(); 
00467     }
00468 };
00469 
00470 struct dbStringValue { 
00471     dbStringValue* next;
00472     char           str[1];
00473 
00474     static char* create(size_t size, dbInheritedAttribute& attr) { 
00475         if (attr.strBufPos + size > sizeof(attr.strBuf)) { 
00476             dbStringValue* sv = 
00477                 (dbStringValue*)new char[offsetof(dbStringValue, str) + size];
00478             sv->next = attr.tempStrings;
00479             attr.tempStrings = sv;
00480             return sv->str;
00481         } else { 
00482             char* p = attr.strBuf + attr.strBufPos;
00483             attr.strBufPos += size;
00484             return p;
00485         }
00486     }
00487 
00488     static char* create(char const* s, dbInheritedAttribute& attr) {
00489         size_t len = strlen(s) + 1;
00490         char*  buf;
00491         if (attr.strBufPos + len > sizeof(attr.strBuf)) { 
00492             dbStringValue* sv = 
00493                 (dbStringValue*)new char[offsetof(dbStringValue,str)+len];
00494             sv->next = attr.tempStrings;
00495             attr.tempStrings = sv;
00496             buf = sv->str;
00497         } else { 
00498             buf = attr.strBuf + attr.strBufPos;
00499             attr.strBufPos += len;
00500         }
00501         return strcpy(buf, s);
00502     }
00503 };
00504 
00505 inline char* findWildcard(char* pattern, char* escape = NULL) 
00506 {
00507     if (escape == NULL) { 
00508         while (*pattern != dbMatchAnyOneChar &&
00509                *pattern != dbMatchAnySubstring)
00510         {
00511             if (*pattern++ == '\0') { 
00512                 return NULL;
00513             }
00514         }
00515     } else { 
00516         char esc = *escape;
00517         while (*pattern != dbMatchAnyOneChar &&
00518                *pattern != dbMatchAnySubstring &&
00519                *pattern != esc)
00520         {
00521             if (*pattern++ == '\0') { 
00522                 return NULL;
00523             }
00524         }
00525     }
00526     return pattern;
00527 }
00528 
00529 inline wchar_t* findWildcard(wchar_t* pattern, wchar_t* escape = NULL) 
00530 {
00531     if (escape == NULL) { 
00532         while (*pattern != dbMatchAnyOneChar &&
00533                *pattern != dbMatchAnySubstring)
00534         {
00535             if (*pattern++ == '\0') { 
00536                 return NULL;
00537             }
00538         }
00539     } else { 
00540         wchar_t esc = *escape;
00541         while (*pattern != dbMatchAnyOneChar &&
00542                *pattern != dbMatchAnySubstring &&
00543                *pattern != esc)
00544         {
00545             if (*pattern++ == '\0') { 
00546                 return NULL;
00547             }
00548         }
00549     }
00550     return pattern;
00551 }
